text: IFA slides were coated with MERS-CoV non-infected or infected Vero cells. Serum samples were diluted in phosphate-buffered saline (PBS) to 1:10, 1:100, 1:250, and 1:1,000, transferred to IFA slides, and incubated for 30 minutes at 37Â°C in a humidified chamber. The IFA slides were washed 3 times in PBS-T for 5 minutes transmission [7, [9] [10] [11] , followed by intra-familial transmission.
